Title: The Wee Free Men.
Subtitle: .

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=8PLblgEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A nightmarish danger threatens from the other side of reality . . . Armed with only a frying pan and her common sense, young witch-to-be Tiffany Aching must defend her home against the monsters of Fairyland. Luckily she has some very unusual help: the local Nac Mac Feegle—aka the Wee Free Men—a clan of fierce, sheep-stealing, sword-wielding, six-inch-high blue men. Together they must face headless horsemen, ferocious grimhounds, terrifying dreams come true, and ultimately the sinister Queen of the Elves herself. . . . A Story of Discworld.
